sen.j: 古典落語（こてんらくご）とは、落語の演目のうち、一般に江戸時代から明治時代に作られたものを指す。
sen.e: Classical rakugo generally includes programs of Rakugo which were created from Edo to Meiji era.
Classical rakugo generally includes programs of Rakugo which were created from the Edo to Meiji eras.
Classical rakugo generally includes programs of Rakugo which were created from the Edo to Meiji eras.

sen.j: それよりも新しい時代に作られた演目は、新作落語と呼んで区別される。
sen.e: Programs which were created after Meiji era are called differently as Shinsaku rakugo (a new and original rakugo story).
Programs which were created after Meiji era are called Shinsaku rakugo (a new and original rakugo story).
Programs which were created after Meiji era are called Shinsaku rakugo (a new and original rakugo story).

sen.j: なお、創作落語は関西の落語家による造語であり文献によっても広く古典と対比されるのは新作とされる。
sen.e: Sosaku Rakugo (a creative rakugo story) is a term coined by a rakugo storyteller of Kansai region, and Shinsaku rakugo is generally compared with Classical Rakugo.
Sosaku Rakugo (a creative rakugo story) is a term coined by a rakugo storyteller of the Kansai region, and Shinsaku rakugo is generally compared with Classical Rakugo.
Sosaku Rakugo (a creative rakugo story) is a term coined by a rakugo storyteller of the Kansai region, and Shinsaku rakugo is generally compared with Classical Rakugo.

sen.j: 落語は、江戸時代、軽めの講談、辻咄（辻芸）として京都の露の五郎兵衛らによって創作された。
sen.e: Rakugo was created by TUSUYU no Gorobe of Kyoto in the Edo era as a light kodan storytelling and tsuji-banashi (also called tsuji-gei, storytelling at crossroads).
sen.cmt: ・一原文一訳文例外対処・辻芸の定訳が"tsujibanashi"となっていましたので、英訳では採用していません。
sen.e: Rakugo was created by TSUYU no Gorobe of Kyoto in the Edo era as a light kodan storytelling and tsuji-banashi (also called tsuji-gei, storytelling at crossroads).
Rakugo was created by TSUYU no Gorobe of Kyoto in the Edo era as a light kodan storytelling and tsuji-banashi (also called tsuji-gei, storytelling at crossroads).

sen.j: 明治時代になって三遊亭圓朝によって大成され、都市化、筆記化とともに大衆文化として花開いた。
sen.e: It was completed by Encho SANYUTEI in the Meiji era, and flourished as public culture along with urbanization and growing literacy rate.
sen.cmt: ・一原文一訳文例外対処・三遊亭は大文字に直しました。・筆記化は「識字率上昇」と読み替えました。
sen.e: It was completed by Encho SANYUTEI in the Meiji era, and flourished as public culture along with urbanization and a growing literacy rate.
It was completed by Encho SANYUTEI in the Meiji era, and flourished as public culture along with urbanization and a growing literacy rate.

sen.j: この時代までに骨格の出来上がった演目が、古典落語に相当する。
sen.e: Programs whose framework was made by this time are regarded as Classical rakugo.
Programs whose framework was made by this time are regarded as Classical rakugo.
Programs whose framework was made by this time are regarded as Classical rakugo.

sen.j: 第二次世界大戦後は、ラジオ寄席、TV放映などを通して人気を維持した。
sen.e: After the Second World War, it maintained its popularity through radio rakugo theater and TV programs.
After the Second World War, it maintained its popularity through radio rakugo theater and TV programs.
After the World War II, it maintained its popularity through radio rakugo theater and TV programs.
sen.cmt: the World War IIに訂正しました。

sen.j: しかし、大衆レベルでの古典文化の喪失、名人の死去、後継者のレベル低下、娯楽の多様化などから、人気が衰えつつある。
sen.e: However due to loss of classic culture at public level, passing away of famous rakugo storytellers, degrading level of successors, and diversification of entertainment, it is getting less popular.

However due to loss of classic culture at the public level, the passing away of famous rakugo storytellers, degrading level of successors, and diversification of entertainment, it is getting less popular.

However due to loss of classic culture at the public level, the passing away of famous rakugo storytellers, degrading level of successors, and diversification of entertainment, it is getting less popular.

sen.j: しかし、2005年の『タイガー&ampドラゴン』や2007年の『酢豆腐』という古典落語を題材とした連続ドラマ（連続テレビ小説ちりとてちん (朝ドラ)）の放送が、若い世代が落語を知る機会となり、新しいファンも増えてきている。
sen.e: Nevertheless "Tiger & amp Dragon" of 2005 and drama series (morning drama series "Chiritotechin") of 2007 featuring a program of classical rakugo "Sudofu" became an opportunity for young generations to know rakugo, and there are increasing new fans.

Nevertheless "Tiger & amp Dragon" of 2005 and drama series (morning drama series "Chiritotechin") of 2007 featuring a program of classical rakugo "Sudofu" became an opportunity for young generations to know rakugo, and there are increasing new fans.

Nevertheless "Tiger and Dragon" of 2005 and drama series (morning drama series "Chiritotechin") of 2007 featuring a program of classical rakugo "Sudofu" became an opportunity for young generations to know rakugo, and there are increasing new fans.
sen.cmt: ＆をandに訂正しました。不要な文字を削除しました。

sen.j: 古典落語の演目は、その内容から、落とし噺と人情噺とに大別される。
sen.e: Programs of classical rakugo are categorized by their stories into stories with comic endings and sentimental stories.
Programs of classical rakugo are categorized by their stories into stories with comic endings and sentimental stories.
Programs of classical rakugo are categorized by their stories into stories with comic endings and sentimental stories.

sen.j: さらに落ちによって分類する方法もある。
sen.e: In some cases they are further categorized by the punch line of a joke.
In some cases they are further categorized by the punch line of a joke.
In some cases they are further categorized by the punch line of a joke.

sen.j: また、上方と江戸で別々に発展したため、以下のように東西によって落語の題名が違ったり、片方にしかない演目がある。
sen.e: As rakugo developed separately in Kamigata and Edo, some programs have different names or are found only in either area.
As rakugo developed separately in Kamigata and Edo, some programs have different names or are found only in either area.
As rakugo developed separately in Kamigata and Edo, some programs have different names or are found only in either area.

sen.j: 落ちの種類についての詳細は、「落ち」の項を参照のこと。
sen.e: See "Ochi" for detail of kinds of ochi.
See "Ochi" for detail of kinds of ochi.
See 'Ochi' for detail of kinds of ochi.
sen.cmt: 原文に合せて"を'に訂正しました。
